32b7('bum): mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par thar ba rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
33a1('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa
33a2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun
33a3('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
33a4('bum): rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
33a5('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid
33a6('bum): kyi phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am
33a7('bum): dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
33b1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
33b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
33b3('bum): pa med pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
33b4('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mkha'
33b5('bum): dang | smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
33b6('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
33b7('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mngon par shes pa
34a1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes
34a2('bum): pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
34a3('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par
34a4('bum): shes pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
34a5('bum): bu/ rnam grangs des na mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ting nge
34a6('bum): 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha'
34a7('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun
34b1('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi
34b2('bum): ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
34b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
34b4('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
34b5('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
34b6('bum): bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus
34b7('bum): mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
35a1('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes
35a2('bum): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
35a3('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
35a4('bum): ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
35a5('bum): dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
35a6('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
35a7('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni
35b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
35b2('bum): bu/ de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus
35b3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
35b4('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
35b5('bum): bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
35b6('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa
35b7('bum): nyid kyi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/
36a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
36a2('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
36a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
36a4('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du snying rje chen
36a5('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe
36a6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad
36a7('bum): du ci'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
36b1('bum): ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
36b2('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
36b3('bum): 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus
36b4('bum): mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
36b5('bum): par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/ tshor ba byang chub sems
36b6('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
36b7('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni
37a1('bum): gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
37a2('bum): na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba med/ byang chub sems
37a3('bum): dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs tes na tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/
37a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du shes med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
37a5('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du byed med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
37a6('bum): bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong
37a7('bum): pa nyid la rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
37b1('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang mig ni mig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mig med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe
37b2('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ / rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rna
37b3('bum): ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni snas stong
37b4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sna med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang
37b5('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lces stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lce med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lce byang
37b6('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lus med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe
37b7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i/ bu rnam grangs des na lus byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
38a1('bum): nyid la yid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang
38a2('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ byang chub sems
38a3('bum): dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgras stong ste/ de
38a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sgra med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sgra byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang
38a5('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /dri ni dris stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dri med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
38a6('bum): na/ dri byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /ro ni ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ro med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /
38a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ro byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg ni reg gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong
38b1('bum): pa nyid la reg med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na reg byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni
38b2('bum): chos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chos byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
38b3('bum): ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
38b4('bum): la mig gi rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig gi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
38b5('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
38b6('bum): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i
38b7('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna'i
39a1('bum): rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i
39a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lce'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'
39a3('bum): zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa
39a4('bum): med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
39a5('bum): so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang
39a6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
39a7('bum): yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan
39b1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig gi 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong
39b2('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa byang chub
39b3('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sna'i 'dus te reg pa med/ byang
39b4('bum): chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus
39b5('bum): te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
39b6('bum): des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
39b7('bum): stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes
40a1('bum): bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi
40a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang
40a3('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de
40a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig gi 'dus
40a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
40a6('bum): gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
40a7('bum): rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
40b1('bum): ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
40b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
40b3('bum): tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang
40b4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
40b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems
40b6('bum): dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /
40b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
41a1('bum): ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems
41a2('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
41a3('bum): sa'i khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
41a4('bum): so/ /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chu'i khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
41a5('bum): des na chu'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la me'i
41a6('bum): khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na me'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi
41a7('bum): dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rlung gi khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
41b1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rlung gi khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
41b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nam mkha'i khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na nam mkha'i khams byang chub sems dpa'
41b3('bum): zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa'i
41b4('bum): khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med
41b5('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma rig pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
41b6('bum): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/
41b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du byed med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
42a1('bum): ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa med/
42a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /
42a3('bum): ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ming dang gzugs med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
42a4('bum): rnam grangs des na ming dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
42a5('bum): stong pa nyid la skye mched drug med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye mched drug byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
42a6('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
42a7('bum): rnam grangs des na reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba med/
42b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/
42b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sred pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sred pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing
42b3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /len pa ni len pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la len pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na len pa
42b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la srid pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe
42b5('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na srid pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
42b6('bum): skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rga shi ni rga
42b7('bum): shis steng ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rga shi med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rga shi byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
43a1('bum): ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha
43a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshul khrims
43a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha
43a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson
43a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
43a6('bum): la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
43a7('bum): nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de
43b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /phyir stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid med/
43b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /stong pa
43b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa
43b4('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
43b5('bum): zhe na/ stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus
43b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa
43b7('bum): nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das
44a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
44a2('bum): na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
44a3('bum): stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
44a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos thams
44a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyi stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid
44a6('bum): stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa
44a7('bum): nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa
44b1('bum): nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa'
44b2('bum): med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/
44b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
44b4('bum): la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
44b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul
44b6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams med/ byang chub sems
44b7('bum): dpa' med do/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stobs rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
45a1('bum): ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /'phags
45a2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ byang chub sems
45a3('bum): dpa' med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ byang chub sems
45a4('bum): dpa' med do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshad med pa
45a5('bum): rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshad med pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
45a6('bum): ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa'
45a7('bum): med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa brgyad med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mthar
45b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
45b2('bum): med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
45b3('bum): smon pa med pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/
45b4('bum): /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /ting nge 'dzin
45b5('bum): rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams
45b6('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45b7('bum): stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs
46a1('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mi 'jigs pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
46a2('bum): ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /snying rje chen po ni snying
46a3('bum): rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la snying rje chen po med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
46a4('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis
46a5('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de
46a6('bum): bzhin nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag pa'i mtha' med/ byang chub sems
46a7('bum): dpa' med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med/ byang
46b1('bum): chub sems dpa' med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa'
46b2('bum): med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /
46b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /
46b4('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs
46b5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/
46b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos med/ byang
46b7('bum): chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs
47a1('bum): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
47a2('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
47a3('bum): so/ /'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par
47a4('bum): shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
47a5('bum): cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
47a6('bum): bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs
47a7('bum): so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes
47b1('bum): ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du
47b2('bum): byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
47b3('bum): byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes
47b4('bum): dang 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med
47b5('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi
47b6('bum): dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang
47b7('bum): sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang sna dang
48a1('bum): lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs
48a2('bum): so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs
48a3('bum): so/ /gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la
48a4('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs
48a5('bum): so/ /reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs
48a6('bum): so/ /chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par
48a7('bum): shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
48b1('bum): la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par
48b2('bum): shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i
48b3('bum): rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs
48b4('bum): so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
48b5('bum): rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam
48b6('bum): par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par
48b7('bum): shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i
49a1('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing
49a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par
49a3('bum): shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te
49a4('bum): reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med
49a5('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg
49a6('bum): pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i
49a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs
49b1('bum): so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus ta reg
49b2('bum): pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing
49b3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg
49b4('bum): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang
49b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs
49b6('bum): so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med
49b7('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
50a1('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus
50a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
50a3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus
50a4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
50a5('bum): byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i
50a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa
50a7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
50b1('bum): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
50b2('bum): las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
50b3('bum): ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i
50b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
50b5('bum): byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni
50b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi
50b7('bum): dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
51a1('bum): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// //shes rab kyi pha
51a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po gya gcig pa/ /sa'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams
51a3('bum): ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
51a4('bum): me'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
51a5('bum): khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
51a6('bum): khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i
51a7('bum): khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs
51b1('bum): so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i

58b1('bum): so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
58b2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
58b3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med
58b4('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi
58b5('bum): dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
58b6('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi
58b7('bum): dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
59a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams ni dran
59a2('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
59a3('bum): rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
59a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
59a5('bum): dbang po dang / stobs rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang
59a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar
59a7('bum): bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam ni lam la
59b1('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi
59b2('bum): dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
59b3('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
59b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
59b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi
59b6('bum): dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
59b7('bum): rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
60a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi
60a2('bum): dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs
60a3('bum): so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
60a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
60a5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar
60a6('bum): pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar
60a7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi
60b1('bum): dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis

60b3('bum): par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni

60b6('bum): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon
60b7('bum): par shes pa rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden
61a1('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
61a2('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
61a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
61a4('bum): ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / /bsam
61a5('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon
61a6('bum): par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
61a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni
61b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi
61b2('bum): dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
61b3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
61b4('bum): byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byams pa chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med
61b5('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ /snying rje
61b6('bum): chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ snying rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po la
61b7('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
62a1('bum): pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas
62a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs
62a3('bum): so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad pa'i chos
62a4('bum): rnams ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams
62a5('bum): ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos
62a6('bum): rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni lan
62a7('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan
62b1('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i
62b2('bum): chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir
62b3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
62b4('bum): ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams
62b5('bum): ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni rigs
62b6('bum): kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i
62b7('bum): sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad
63a1('bum): pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang /
63a2('bum): brgyad pa'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mthong ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi
63a3('bum): dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsrabs pa'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /

63a5('bum): ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'dod

63a7('bum): pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa

63b3('bum): ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi

63b6('bum): pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang
63b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs
64a1('bum): pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs
64a2('bum): pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la
64a3('bum): med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

64a6('bum): cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam
64a7('bum): pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med
64b1('bum): cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
64b2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi
64b3('bum): dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs
64b4('bum): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan
64b5('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni dgra
64b6('bum): bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan
64b7('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir ma 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas
65a1('bum): ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig
65a2('bum): phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la
