259b4('bum): ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
259b5('bum): ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
259b6('bum): gyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
259b7('bum): tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg
260a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
260a2('bum): ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
260a3('bum): ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams kyi
260a4('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam
260a5('bum): mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad
260a6('bum): du/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam
260a7('bum): par shes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/
260b1('bum): reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa'i ma
260b2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
260b3('bum): ni/ rga shi ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul
260b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
260b5('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin
260b6('bum): pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
260b7('bum): 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi
261a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa
261a2('bum): nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/
261a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/
261a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
261a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
261a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
261a7('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po
261b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po med
261b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ dran pa nye
261b3('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
261b4('bum): ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin/
261b5('bum): stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags
261b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
261b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
262a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
262a2('bum): rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang
262a3('bum): yin pa de ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang
262a4('bum): yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par
262a5('bum): shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi
262a6('bum): sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes
262a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams
262b1('bum): pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma
262b2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
262b3('bum): yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
262b4('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/
262b5('bum): gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
262b6('bum): ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
262b7('bum): tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
263a1('bum): grangs des na 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa
263a2('bum): de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
263a3('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes
263a4('bum): pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni mig gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mig ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang
263a5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin
263a6('bum): pa de rna ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni snas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
263a7('bum): sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce ni lces stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
263b1('bum): rnam grangs des na lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lce ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang
263b2('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid ma yin te
263b3('bum): skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis
263b4('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang
263b5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra ni sgras stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sgra ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no/ /
263b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dri ni dris stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dri ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no/ /
263b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ro ni ros stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ro ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin
264a1('bum): no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg ni reg gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
264a2('bum): na reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
264a3('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong
264a4('bum): ste/ gang stong pa de na mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin
264a5('bum): pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par
264a6('bum): shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /
264a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
264b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni
264b2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma
264b3('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi
264b4('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /
264b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
264b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
264b7('bum): ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig gi 'dus te reg
265a1('bum): pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg
265a2('bum): pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang
265a3('bum): yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma
265a4('bum): yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
265a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
265a6('bum): grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te
265a7('bum): reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mi skyes pa
265b1('bum): gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te
265b2('bum): reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang
265b3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
265b4('bum): gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te
265b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong
265b6('bum): pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma
265b7('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
266a1('bum): gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
266a2('bum): des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
266a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
266a4('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
266a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin
266a6('bum): te skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
266a7('bum): gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de
266b1('bum): ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang
266b2('bum): yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sa'i khams ma
266b3('bum): yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i
266b4('bum): khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
266b5('bum): pa de chu'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni me'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
266b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na me'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong
266b7('bum): ste/ gang stong pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma
267a1('bum): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin te
267a2('bum): skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
267a3('bum): bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
267a4('bum): grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/
267a5('bum): gang stong pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
267a6('bum): pa ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du byed kyi ma skyes
267a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de'i 'du byed ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye
267b1('bum): ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ming
267b2('bum): dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ming dang gzugs kyi
267b3('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ming dang gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin te skye
267b4('bum): ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye mched drug gi ma skyes ba gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa ni reg
267b5('bum): pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
267b6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin
267b7('bum): pa de tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sred pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na
268a1('bum): sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ len pa ni len pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni len pa ma yin te skye ba
268a2('bum): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/

268a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye
268a5('bum): ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi na rga shis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rga shi'i
268a6('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha
268a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma
268b1('bum): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te
268b2('bum): skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa

268b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na bsam gtan gyi pha
269a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

269a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong

269b1('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i

269b4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med
269b5('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus

269b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong

270a2('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis

270a6('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis

270b1('bum): yin pa de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma

270b3('bum): bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam

270b6('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang
270b7('bum): stong pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mi dmigs
271a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos
271a2('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
271a3('bum): ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ste/ gang stong pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa

271a7('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i

271b2('bum): rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yang dag par spong
271b3('bum): ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/

271b5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
271b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong

272a1('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin
272a2('bum): te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
272a3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin
272a4('bum): te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
272a5('bum): pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa
272a6('bum): rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no/ /
272a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
272b1('bum): bu/ rnam grangs des na bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis
272b2('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshad med pa rnams
272b3('bum): ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs
272b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang
272b5('bum): yin pa de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de
272b6('bum): ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin
272b7('bum): no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mthar
273a1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
273a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
273a3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
273a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
273a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
273a6('bum): ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
273a7('bum): rnam grangs des na mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin
273b1('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa da ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ting nge
273b2('bum): 'dzin rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang
273b3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
273b4('bum): stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
273b5('bum): rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mi 'jigs pa
273b6('bum): rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma
273b7('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong
274a1('bum): pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma
274a2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byams pa chen
274a3('bum): po ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
274a4('bum): ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na snying rje chen po'i
274a5('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
274a6('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
274a7('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis
274b1('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thams cad
274b2('bum): shes pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te
274b3('bum): skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa

274b6('bum): skad du/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin/

276b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ /

294a7('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
294b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su
294b2('bum): byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
294b3('bum): tshor ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
294b4('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
294b5('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di
294b6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
294b7('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
295a1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg
295a2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
295a3('bum): ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /
295a4('bum): 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ lus kyi
295a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni
295a6('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid kyi
295a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te
295b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sa'i
295b2('bum): khams/ sa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di sa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chu'i
295b3('bum): khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chu'i khams chu'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na
295b4('bum): gang 'di chu'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar me'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang me'i khams/

295b6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams rlung gi khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di
295b7('bum): rlung gi khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i
296a1('bum): khams/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis
296a2('bum): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rnam
296a3('bum): par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /

296a5('bum): des na gang 'di ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'du byed kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'du
296a6('bum): byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par

296b2('bum): skyes pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med
296b3('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang skye mched drug /skye mched drug nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang

297a2('bum): skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang len pa/ len pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di len pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su

297a4('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di srid pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar skye ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa

297a7('bum): shi zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sbyin

297b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
297b4('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

297b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
297b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol

298a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe
298a4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
298a5('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po go gnyis pa/ /'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid
298a6('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyang
298a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di
298b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/

298b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
298b4('bum): rnam grangs des na gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/

298b6('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes
298b7('bum): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
299a1('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
299a2('bum): rnam grangs des na gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang

299a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
299a5('bum): nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong
299a6('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
299a7('bum): kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di thog ma dang tha ma med
299b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su med byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa
299b2('bum): stong pa nyid/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas
299b3('bum): pa'o/ /'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
299b4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
299b5('bum): ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang
299b6('bum): 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes
299b7('bum): pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya
300a1('bum): ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
300a2('bum): kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis
300a3('bum): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/ dngos
300a4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /
300a5('bum): 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
300a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
300a7('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
300b1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan
300b2('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
300b3('bum): des na gang 'di dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan
300b4('bum): ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di yang dag par spong
300b5('bum): ba rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi
300b6('bum): rkang pa rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
300b7('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams/ dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
301a1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di dbang po rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma
301a2('bum): yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di stobs rnams zhes
301a3('bum): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan
301a4('bum): lag rnams/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med
301a5('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
301a6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
301a7('bum): pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags
301b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med
301b2('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma skyes
301b3('bum): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di bsam gtan rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma
301b4('bum): yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams/ tshad med pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di tshad med
301b5('bum): pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes
301b6('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di
301b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin
302a1('bum): te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam par thar pa
302a2('bum): rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes
302a3('bum): pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na
302a4('bum): gang 'di mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
302a5('bum): dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par
302a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
302a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/
302b1('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba
302b2('bum): de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
302b3('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang
302b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang
302b5('bum): 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/
302b6('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di de
302b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma

303a2('bum): pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa

303a4('bum): par rig pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar byams pa chen po'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang

303a6('bum): byas pa'o/ /'di ltar snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
303a7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma
303b1('bum): yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
303b2('bum): bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin/

303b5('bum): pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
303b6('bum): 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i
303b7('bum): 'bras bu/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su

304a4('bum): chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lam

304a7('bum): pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
304b1('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
304b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag

307b7('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams

308a2('bum): du/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag
308a3('bum): pa'i slad du/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu
308a4('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
308a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
308a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/

308b2('bum): 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/

308b6('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis
308b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes la/ tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/ 'du shes kyang ma skyes pa/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes
309a1('bum): pa'ang ma skyes pa/ mig kyang ma skyes la/ rna ba'ang ma skyes pa/ sna'ang ma skyes pa/ lce'ang ma skyes pa/ lus kyang ma skyes pa/ yid kyang ma skyes pa/ gzugs kyang
309a2('bum): ma skyes la/ sgra'ang ma skyes pa/ dri'ang ma skyes pa/ ro'ang ma skyes pa/ reg kyang ma skyes pa/ chos kyang ma skyes pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang
309a3('bum): ma skyes pa/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ mig
309a4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang ma
309a5('bum): skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/ sna'i

309a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/ sa'i khams kyang ma skyes la/ chu'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ me'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ rlung gi khams kyang ma skyes pa/ nam mkha'i
309b1('bum): khams kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ ma rig pa'ang ma skyes la/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ ming dang gzugs kyang ma skyes

310a4('bum): med pa bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
310a5('bum): dgu'ang ma skyes pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang ma skyes pa /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
310a6('bum): ma skyes pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang ma skyes pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang ma skyes
310a7('bum): pa/ byams pa chen po'ang ma skyes pa/ snying rje chen po'ang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ lam gyi rnam pa

310b2('bum): zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang ma skyes pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang ma skyes pa/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes

310b5('bum): la/ tshor ba'ang skye ba med/ 'du shes kyang skye ba med/ 'du byed kyang skye ba med/ rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/ mig kyang skye ba med la/ rna ba'ang skye ba med/ sna'ang skye ba med/ lce'ang
310b6('bum): skye ba med/ lus kyang skye ba med/ yid kyang skye ba med/ gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ sgra'ang skye ba med/ dri'ang skye ba med/ ro'ang skye ba med/ reg kyang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med/ mig
310b7('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/ lus kyi rnam par shes
311a1('bum): pa'ang skye ba med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/ sna'i 'dus te reg
311a2('bum): pa'ang skye ba med/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang

311a5('bum): khams kyang skye ba med/ rlung gi khams kyang skye ba med/ nam mkha'i khams kyang skye ba med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang skye ba med/ ma rig pa'ang skye ba med la/ 'du byed kyang skye

311b4('bum): pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba
