312a5('bum): shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med la/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba
312a6('bum): med/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang skye ba med/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang skye ba med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang
312a7('bum): skye ba med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/ dgra bcom pa'ang skye ba med/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba
312b1('bum): med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med na ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
312b2('bum): kyis kyang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi
312b3('bum): theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par
312b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba lnga rnams kyang / tha mi dad par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab
312b5('bum): 'byor/ gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na/ ci'i phyir na/ rgyun du zhugs pas ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags
312b6('bum): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni/ dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ dgra bcom pas ni bla
312b7('bum): ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni/ rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems
313a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin
313a2('bum): gshegs pas ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/
313a3('bum): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la
313a4('bum): 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la
313a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
313a6('bum): yod par mi 'dod do/ ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do/ /
313a7('bum): rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par yang mi 'dod do/ /byang
313b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na/ sems can
313b2('bum): tshad med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa
313b3('bum): dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas/ sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di
313b4('bum): ltar sems bskyed de/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya'ang / de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa/ de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la'ang
313b5('bum): 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
313b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod do/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
313b7('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am/ 'thob par bya ba mi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos skyes pas thob pa dang / 'thob par bya
314a1('bum): bar 'dod dam/ 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skyes pa'i chos
314a2('bum): kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'o na 'thob pa med pa la mngon par rtogs pa med
314a3('bum): dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa'ang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod do/ gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob
314a4('bum): pa 'am mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs
314a5('bum): rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ don dam par ni 'thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs pa'am/ rgyun du zhugs
314a6('bum): pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe
314a7('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi/ don dam par ma yin
314b1('bum): nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha
314b2('bum): snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam par ni las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med/ kun nas nyon mongs
314b3('bum): pa'ang med/ rnam par byang ba'ang med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ma skyes pa'i chos skye par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
314b4('bum): bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do/ /skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar mi 'dod pa gang yin// //
314b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po go gsum pa/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
314b6('bum): bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du shes ma skyes pa rang
314b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam
315a1('bum): par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mig ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
315a2('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
315a3('bum): bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus ma skyes pa rang bzhin
315a4('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs
315a5('bum): ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
315a6('bum): bdag ni dri ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ro ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
315a7('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/
315b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes
315b2('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
315b3('bum): bu/ bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
315b4('bum): skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mig gi
315b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /
315b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa
315b7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
316a1('bum): bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
316a2('bum): ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
316a3('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
316a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma skyes
316a5('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe
316a6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chu'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
316a7('bum): pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni me'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rlung gi khams
316b1('bum): ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nam mkha'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
316b2('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma rig pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
316b3('bum): bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa ma skyes
316b4('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ming dang gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
316b5('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
316b6('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sred pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
316b7('bum): stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni len pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni srid pa ma skyes
317a1('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
317a2('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rga sha mi skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin
317a3('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
317a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes
317a5('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
317a6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang
317a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
317b1('bum): bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi
317b2('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid
317b3('bum): ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
317b4('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma
317b5('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe
317b6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma
317b7('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
318a1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mi
318a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi
318a3('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po med pa'i
318a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar
318a5('bum): mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul
318a6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe
318a7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stobs rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma skyes
318b1('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
318b2('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams ma skyes pa
318b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad med pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
318b4('bum): bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma skyes pa rang
318b5('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe
318b6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
318b7('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
319a1('bum): stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan
319a2('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams ma
319a3('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe
319a4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po ma skyes pa rang
319a5('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
319a6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
319a7('bum): 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi
319b1('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang byang chub ma skyes pa
319b2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
319b3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod pa gang /
319b4('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
319b5('bum): pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du shes skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa
319b6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
319b7('bum): bdag ni mig skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
320a1('bum): bu/ bdag ni sna skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi
320a2('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis
320a3('bum): stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra skyes pa
320a4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dri skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ro
320a5('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
320a6('bum): bdag ni chos skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mig gi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
320a7('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes
320b1('bum): pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
320b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin
320b3('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag
320b4('bum): ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/
320b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang
320b6('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
320b7('bum): bdag ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skyes
321a1('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
321a2('bum): bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
321a3('bum): bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
321a4('bum): ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
321a5('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni chu'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni me'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
321a6('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rlung gi khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nam mkha'i khams skyes pa rang
321a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag
321b1('bum): ni ma rig pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
321b2('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ming dang gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /
321b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod de/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
321b4('bum): bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sred pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
321b5('bum): skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni len pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni srid pa skyes pa rang bzhin
321b6('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skye ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rga shi skyes pa
321b7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
322a1('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha
322a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi
322a3('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni
322a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin
322a5('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag
322a6('bum): ni phyi nang stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
322a7('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid
322b1('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
322b2('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin
322b3('bum): gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
322b4('bum): bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
322b5('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan
322b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi
322b7('bum): 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ngo
323a1('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skyes bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skyed pa
323a2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar ma'i 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
323a3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skyes pa
323a4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyi stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
323a5('bum): bu/ bdag ni stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
323a6('bum): skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
323a7('bum): bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
323b1('bum): skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad med pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs med pa'i
323b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /
323b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam
323b4('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mngon par
323b5('bum): shes pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
323b6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
323b7('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
324a1('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po
324a2('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
324a3('bum): bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang
324a4('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
324a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
324a6('bum): pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang byang chub skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam
324a7('bum): pa shes pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
324b1('bum): do| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ skye ba skye'am/ 'on tam mi skye ba skye/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba'ang mi skye/ mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o/ /de
324b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa
324b3('bum): bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye/ mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o/ /
324b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba
324b5('bum): med pa'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni/
324b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med
324b7('bum): pa'ang bdag gis ni brjod par spobs pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa
325a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa
325a2('bum): bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ brjod pa ni skye ba med ces bya ba yin te/ spobs
325a3('bum): pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
325a4('bum): ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o/ /spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o/ /chos ni ma skyes pa'o/ /gang las brtsams te smra bar spobs pa'i las de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i
325a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med do/ /tshor ba skye ba med do/ /'du shes skye ba med do/ /'du byed skye ba med do/ /rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /mig skye ba med do/ /
325a6('bum): rna ba skye ba med do/ /sna skye ba med do/ /lce skye ba med do/ /lus skye ba med do/ /yid skye ba med do/ /gzugs skye ba med do/ /sgra skye ba med do/ /dri skye ba med do/ /ro skye ba med do/ /reg skye ba
325a7('bum): med do/ /chos skye ba med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /
325b1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba med
325b2('bum): do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do/ /rna ba'i
325b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
325b4('bum): gyis tshor ba skye ba med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do/ /sa'i khams skye ba med do/ /chu'i khams skye ba med do/ /me'i khams skye ba med do/ /rlung gi khams skye ba
325b5('bum): med do/ /nam mkha'i khams skye ba med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba med do/ /ma rig pa skye ba med do/ /'du byed skye ba med do/ /rnam par shes pa skye ba med do/ /ming dang gzugs
325b6('bum): skye ba med do/ /skye mched drug skye ba med do/ /reg pa skye ba med do/ /tshor ba skye ba med do/ /sred pa skye ba med do/ /len pa skye ba med do/ /srid pa skye ba med do/ /skye ba skye ba med do/ /rga shi skye ba
325b7('bum): med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /
326a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /phyi nang stong
326a2('bum): pa nyid skye ba med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /'dus ma byas
326a3('bum): stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
326a4('bum): skye ba med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /
326a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams skye ba med do/ /rdzu
326a6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye ba med do/ /dbang po rnams skye ba med do/ /stobs rnams skye ba med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye ba med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye
326a7('bum): ba med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba med do/ /bsam gtan rnams skye ba med do/ /tshad med pa rnams skye ba med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba med
326b1('bum): do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skye ba med
326b2('bum): do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
326b3('bum): skye ba med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba med do/ /byams pa chen po skye ba med do/ /snying rje chen po skye ba med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
326b4('bum): 'bras bu skye ba med do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med do/ /rang byang chub skye ba med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa
326b5('bum): shes pa nyid skye ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na brjod pa ni skye ba med pa ste/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba
326b6('bum): med do/ /gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
326b7('bum): ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos
327a1('bum): thams cad la gnas pa med pa dag gi chos nyid de/ de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad
327a2('bum): mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na chos thams cad mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin
327a3('bum): gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang
327a4('bum): na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi
327a5('bum): rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis
327a6('bum): ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
327a7('bum): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
327b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni rang bzhin gyis
327b2('bum): stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/
327b3('bum): phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med
327b4('bum): par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
327b5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra ni

327b7('bum): na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi

328a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs

328a7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
328b1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
328b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i
